alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 9:07PM CDT until March 26 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS COUNTY... At 905 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Dallas County Horse Arena to 9 miles northwest of Pine Apple, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Selma, Selmont-West Selmont, Belknap, Gardner Island, Tyler, Dallas Lake, Old Cahaba Park, Memorial Stadium, Burnsville, Dallas County Horse Arena, Potter Station, Dannelly Reservoir, Skyharbor Airport, Tilden, Whites Bluff, Carlowville, Minter, Craig Field Aiport, Selma Drag Strip and Edmund Pettus Bridge. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
